data.title: Honouring History and Heritage
data.meta_description: Discover and commemorate historical sites. Learn about the notable individuals and events that shaped our history.
data.text:
What are Blue Plaques?

Blue Plaques are a distinctive cultural marker found throughout the UK, installed to honour significant historical figures and events. These plaques provide a tangible link to our past, allowing us to walk in the footsteps of those who have left an indelible mark on our history. From celebrated authors and pioneering scientists to revolutionary politicians and cultural icons, each blue plaque tells a unique story.

More Info

For inquiries, contributions, or more information, please contact us at: info@blue-plaques.co.uk

Blue Plaques is affiliated to the Great Yarmouth Local History and Archaeological Society.

If you wish to find our more about the creation of this site, please visit our acknowledgements page.

Thank you for visiting the Blue Plaques of Great Yarmouth. Together, let's celebrate and preserve our shared history, one plaque at a time.
